demolition

Class ExplosionTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.GameObject
      • demolition.ExplosionTile

  • public class ExplosionTile
extends GameObject
    Explosion tile, can be centre, vertical, or horizontal, and destroys any moving thing and brokenwall in its path. Collision an deletion of objects hit by explosion is handled by the gamemanager, that has knowledge of locations of all objects

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class demolition.GameObject
